name: A. Lucky Division
statement:
Petya calls a number if it could be evenly divided by some lucky number.
Help him find out if the given number is almost lucky.
editorial: In this problem you just need to loop through the integers i from 1 to n determine, is i lucky, if yes, then try, if n mod i = 0, then answer is "YES". If there are no such i, answer is "NO".
